A0: the Caspian Five countries - Russia , Azerbaijan , Iran , Kazakhstan and
RelatedSentence: Last month , the Caspian Five countries - Russia , Azerbaijan , Iran , Kazakhstan and Turkmenistan - saw significant progress during a round of talks on the settlement of the legal status of the Caspian Sea .
Large fishery resources , as well as vast oil and gas deposits have made the sea a subject of heated territorial disputes .
For decades , the inland sea was the exclusive domain of the USSR and Iran , but after the collapse of the Soviet Union new players emerged to claim an interest in the region .
